```python
import math

n, x = map(int, input().split())
ans = 0
cur_x = x
cur_y = 0
total_dist = 0
while True:
    dist_bc = math.sqrt(3) * (n - cur_x)
    total_dist += dist_bc
    cur_x = n - cur_y
    cur_y = n - cur_x + cur_y
    if abs(cur_x - x) < 1e-6 and abs(cur_y) < 1e-6:
        break
    dist_ab = math.sqrt((cur_x - x)**2 + cur_y**2)
    total_dist += dist_ab
    cur_x = x + (x - cur_x)
    cur_y = -cur_y
    dist_bc = math.sqrt(3) * (n - cur_x)
    total_dist += dist_bc
    cur_x = n - cur_y
    cur_y = n - cur_x + cur_y

print(int(total_dist))

```
